name: application-server
description: 1. Server Deployment (GCP Cloud Run) - [x] Create Project in GCP - [x] Clear unused Docker containers and images `docker system prune -a` - [x] Create Docker file - [] Create docker image `docker build -t angular-application-server .` - [] View docker images: `docker images` - [] Start local container: `docker run -p 8080:8080 angular-application-server`
author: R.T.
